statements: SELECT * FROM TreatmentMethods;
SELECT treatment_name, success_rate FROM TreatmentMethods ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM TreatmentMethods WHERE success_rate > 80;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM TreatmentMethods WHERE cost < 500.00;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_name FROM TreatmentMethods ORDER BY treatment_name ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, success_rate FROM TreatmentMethods WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY treatment_name DESC
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM TreatmentMethods WHERE success_rate >= 0.8 ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT * FROM TreatmentMethods WHERE success_rate < 0.5 AND cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY treatment_id
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_name, cost FROM TreatmentMethods WHERE success_rate < 0.7 ORDER BY cost DESC, treatment_id
SELECT treatment_name, success_rate, cost FROM TreatmentMethods WHERE success_rate >= 0.6 ORDER BY success_rate DESC, cost
SELECT method_name, effectiveness_score FROM treatment_methods
SELECT * FROM treatment_methods ORDER BY method_id DESC
SELECT patient_name, result FROM patient_results WHERE method_id = 1
SELECT * FROM patient_results ORDER BY patient_id LIMIT 3
SELECT method_name, COUNT(*) as total_patients FROM treatment_methods JOIN patient_results ON treatment_methods.method_id = patient_results.method_id GROUP BY method_name
SELECT * FROM treatment_methods ORDER BY method_name ASC, method_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, method_name, result FROM patient_results LEFT JOIN treatment_methods ON patient_results.method_id = treatment_methods.method_id;
SELECT AVG(effectiveness_score) AS average_score FROM treatment_methods WHERE method_name LIKE '%therapy%';
SELECT * FROM patient_results WHERE result IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT patient_name, result FROM patient_results WHERE method_id IN (SELECT method_id FROM treatment_methods WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.7);
SELECT * FROM treatment_methods;
SELECT method_name, effectiveness_rating FROM treatment_methods ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT condition_name FROM conditions WHERE condition_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, method_name FROM patients JOIN treatment_methods ON patients.treatment_method_id = treatment_methods.method_id ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT method_name, effectiveness_rating FROM treatment_methods;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, condition_name FROM patients JOIN conditions ON patients.patient_id = conditions.condition_id;
SELECT condition_name, condition_description FROM conditions WHERE LENGTH(condition_description) > 50;
SELECT patient_name, method_name FROM patients JOIN treatment_methods ON patients.treatment_method_id = treatment_methods.method_id;
SELECT id, name, description FROM TreatmentMethods;
SELECT name, age, gender, condition FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentRecords WHERE outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT id, method_id, date, outcome FROM TreatmentRecords ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT method_id, effectiveness_rating FROM MethodEfficacy WHERE side_effects IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT Patients.name, TreatmentMethods.name FROM Patients JOIN TreatmentRecords ON Patients.id = TreatmentRecords.patient_id JOIN TreatmentMethods ON TreatmentRecords.method_id = TreatmentMethods.id;

SELECT TreatmentMethods.name, MethodEfficacy.effectiveness_rating FROM TreatmentMethods JOIN MethodEfficacy ON TreatmentMethods.id = MethodEfficacy.method_id WHERE MethodEfficacy.effectiveness_rating > 75;

SELECT Patients.name, Patients.age, TreatmentRecords.date, MethodEfficacy.side_effects FROM Patients JOIN TreatmentRecords ON Patients.id = TreatmentRecords.patient_id JOIN MethodEfficacy ON TreatmentRecords.method_id = MethodEfficacy.method_id WHERE TreatmentRecords.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT method_name, success_rate FROM treatment_methods WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT condition_name FROM conditions WHERE condition_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_treatments WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT method_name, success_rate FROM treatment_methods WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT condition_name FROM conditions WHERE condition_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY condition_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, method_name, treatment_date, outcome FROM patient_treatments WHERE outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;

SELECT method_name, success_rate, average_duration FROM treatment_methods JOIN treatment_statistics ON treatment_methods.id = treatment_statistics.treatment_id WHERE success_rate > 0.7 AND average_duration < 60 ORDER BY success_rate DESC, average_duration ASC;
